BonusSpellFeature.Name: Crystal Ball of Truesight
BonusSpellFeature.Text: The typical crystal ball, a very rare item, is about 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the scrying spell (save DC 17) with it. While scrying with the crystal ball, you have truesight with a radius of 120 feet centered on the spell's sensor.
